name: TILE RUSH! (Falillo)
description:
Tile Rush!

Tile rush is a rhythm and memory game, don't move while you are seeing the path!

How to play

Memory : You need to memorize the path to complete the level, you can also press space to see a little time the path.

Rush: You have to complete the level the fast as you can, but carefully, you can't move while you are seeing the path.

Credits

Programming and art2D by Falillo.

Music - Aries beats royalty free

Developed while studying at EVAD.

This project is already in an alpha version, in the future I have in mind to improve it and add new content.
